sql.if: AND ( ENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CONTRACT_NM LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CONTRACT_TYPE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR ENT_TYPE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR STATE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR CANCEL_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR ENT_REG_DATE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ENTERPRICE E, CONTRACT_MASTER CM WHERE 1 = 1 AND CM.ENT_NO = E.ENT_NO

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY P.CONTRACT_PRICE DESC) AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT E.ENT_NO, E.ENT_NAME, SUM(CM.CONTRACT_PRICE) AS CONTRACT_PRICE, COUNT(*) || '건' AS BUSINESS_COUNT, E.ENT_TYPE, CASE WHEN MAX(BM.BUSINESS_STATE) IS NULL THEN ' - ' WHEN MAX(BM.BUSINESS_STATE) = 1 THEN '보류' WHEN MAX(BM.BUSINESS_STATE) = 2 THEN '영업완료' WHEN MAX(BM.BUSINESS_STATE) = 3 THEN '보류' ELSE ' - ' END AS BUSINESS_STATE, CASE WHEN MAX(BM.BUSINESS_STATE) = 3 THEN NVL(MAX(CM.CANCEL_CONTENT), '-') ELSE '-' END AS CANCEL_CONTENT, MIN(E.ENT_REG_DATE) AS ENT_REG_DATE FROM BUSINESS_MANAGE BM JOIN ENTERPRICE E ON E.ENT_NO = BM.ENT_NO JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CM ON BM.CONTRACT_NO = CM.CONTRACT_NO GROUP BY E.ENT_NO, E.ENT_NAME, E.ENT_TYPE ) P ) P WHERE P.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} - 1) * 10 + 1 AND #{currentPage} * 10

SELECT E.ENT_NAME, CM.CONTRACT_NM, CM.CONTRACT_NO, E.ENT_TYPE, E.ENT_NO, CASE WHEN CM.CONTRACT_TYPE = 'A' THEN '신규계약' WHEN CM.CONTRACT_TYPE = 'B' THEN '연장계약' WHEN CM.CONTRACT_TYPE = 'C' THEN '변경계약' ELSE '-' END AS CONTRACT_TYPE, E.ENT_REG_DATE FROM ENTERPRICE E JOIN CONTRACT_MASTER CM ON CM.ENT_NO = E.ENT_NO WHERE CM.ENT_NO = #{entNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ENTERPRICE SET ENT_NAME = #{entName}, ENT_TEL = #{entTel}, ROAD_ADD = #{roadAdd}, DETAIL_ADD = #{detailAdd}, REP_NAME = #{repName}, ENT_TYPE = #{entType}, ENT_REG_DATE = #{entRegDate}, ENT_CUST = #{entCust} WHERE ENT_NO = #{entNo}
